text: Robin Lynne Kelly (born April 30, 1956) is an American politician. She is the U.S. Representative from since 2013. She is a Democrat. Kelly was in the Illinois House of Representatives from 2003 to 2007. She then was chief of staff for Illinois State Treasurer Alexi Giannoulias until 2010. In May 2025, Kelly announced she would be retiring from the U.S. House to run for the U.S. Senate in 2026. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African-American politicians Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly
title: Robin Kelly
